title: Two edge contractions for the affine super Yangian
abstract:
In the previous paper, we constructed two kinds of edge contractions for the
affine super Yangian. In this article, we show that these two edge contractions
are commutative with each other. As an application, we give a homomorphism from
the affine super Yangian to some centralizer algebras of the universal
enveloping algebra of $W$-algebras of type $A$.
